definitions.definition: Happening or occurring frequently , with repetition .
examples: Revenge is a recurring theme in this novel.

definitions.definition: Of a decimal : having a set of digits that is repeated indefinitely .
examples: Every rational number can be written as either a terminating decimal or a recurring decimal.

main_definition: Happening or occurring frequently , with repetition .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , not comparable ) Of a decimal : having a set of digits that is repeated indefinitely .
